commiserate be celebrating or commiserating together in the same venue post-match.
definition: To feel or express compassion or sympathy for (someone or something).
(intransitive) To offer condolences jointly with; express sympathy with.
(intransitive, as the phrasal verb commiserate with) To sympathize; condole.
